snippet.title: A Thief's Quest Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
In A THIEF'S QUEST players take on the role of a professional thief on the run from police who, while trying to find a place to lie low, ends up getting pulled into one of the biggest heists of their career.

#indiegame #rpgmaker #rpg 

A THIEF’S QUEST takes roughly one hour to finish in a normal playthrough and about an hour and a half for 100% completion. Players who achieve a score of 100/100 (score is given after the game is beaten and the credits roll) gain access to a special gauntlet challenge.

Want to play A THIEF'S QUEST early? Join our Patreon and start playing today!
https://www.patreon.com/filthyandfree

Check out the game page for A THIEF'S QUEST below:
https://filthyandfree.itch.io/thiefs-quest-game

The official release date will be September 2, 2022!

Stay tuned to https://www.filthyandfreepublishing.com for more updates!
